name: LOGistICAL: Caribbean
description: LOGistICAL: Caribbean is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the countries. Over 1000 towns to complete across the islands of the Caribbean covering 26 different countries.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256+MB with 1024x768 resolution Storage: 300 MB available space
